title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 890.16 - Project construction scheduling
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 890.16 - Project construction scheduling

State Regulations

The commission will consider new projects economically
justified for construction scheduling by the commission when: (a) The unit cost of additional water supply
at a new location is not more than the unit cost of additional development of
water supply at established facilities in the same service area. (b) The annual benefits from all project
purposes equal or exceed their total annual cost. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
890.16

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
